name: papilio_audio
author: GadgetFactory
sentence: Retro sound chip emulation library for Papilio Arcade FPGA
paragraph: Provides API for controlling SID 6581 (Commodore 64), YM2149 (Atari ST/ZX Spectrum), and POKEY (Atari 8-bit) sound chips implemented in the FPGA via Wishbone-over-SPI interface.
